Hi,

for my diploma thesis I plan to implement a link prediction module using 
Heritrix.
For this task I would like to extract special attributes of an anchor 
like title or linktext.
Is extraction of these features already implemented in Heritrix?
I can't actually find it in the current sourcecode of ExtractorHTML.

If I have to implement it on my own, I think it whould be good practise 
to write an own extractor,
and to use alist on the CrawlURI level to save the extracted features. A 
post
processor after the LinkScoper "transfers" these key-value pairs to
the "out candidate links". Or is there even a better way to implement it?

Any help whould be appreciated
Thanks a lot

Christian Krumm
